Articles.Content:
So i installed BDArmory a few days ago, placed the gamedata's contents in the actual gamedata folder.

After launching it it didnt show up on my top right, i thought it wasnt working.

Today i was looking through the advanced filters for placing and i saw some of the BDArmory parts being present there, but not outside the advanced filters.

I decided to put a few on my vessel and try it out. Not even a single BDArmory part worked.

Does anyone know how i can fix this?
I dont think BDArmory has been updated to 1.5 yet.  You may have to wait for it to update before downloading and installing.

You have not installed it correctly. For nearly every mod, you do not put the contents of the gamedata in the gamedata folder. You just copy the BDArmory folder and put it in the GameData of KSP. Otherwise, you can break mods.

On 10/18/2018 at 12:02 AM, Hodo said:

I dont think BDArmory has been updated to 1.5 yet.  You may have to wait for it to update before downloading and installing. 

Other than that, did you install the dependencies? PRE and module manager
